TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ToolBar/SplitButtonDropDown extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the drop-down portion of a combined regular button and drop-down button. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButtonDropDown> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the drop-down portion of a combined regular button and drop-down button.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButtonDropDown.HotChecked%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementToolBarSplitButtonDropDown6` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#269](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#269)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#269](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#269)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Checked As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a split drop-down button in the checked state.
Docs.value: A that represents a split drop-down button in the checked state.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ToolBar.SplitButtonDropDown.Checked%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
